memberdef.definition: using PolarBSplines< BSplinesR, BSplinesTheta, C >::Impl< DDim, MemorySpace >::singular_basis_linear_combination_idx_range_type = IdxRange<DDim, BSplinesR, BSplinesTheta>
memberdef.name: singular_basis_linear_combination_idx_range_type

detaileddescription.para: The type of the index range for the linear combinations defining the B-splines which traverse the singular point.

The B-splines which traverse the singular O-point are constructed from a linear combination of 2D B-splines. These 2D B-splines can be expressed as a tensor product of 1D B-splines. This type describes the index range on which the coefficients of these linear combinations are defined. There is an index for the polar bspline being constructed, and 2 indices for the 2D bspline.

memberdef.name: discrete_dimension_type

memberdef.name: Impl

parameterdescription.para: A mapping from curvilinear to Cartesian coordinates. This is used to find the singular point and determine the Barycentric coordinates which are used to define the new basis splines which cross the singular point.

memberdef.definition: KOKKOS_FUNCTION Idx< BSplinesR, BSplinesTheta > PolarBSplines< BSplinesR, BSplinesTheta, C >::Impl< DDim, MemorySpace >::eval_basis
memberdef.argsstring: (DSpan1D singular_values, DSpan2D values, ddc::Coordinate< DimR, DimTheta > p) const
memberdef.name: eval_basis

briefdescription.para: Evaluate the polar basis splines at the coordinate p.

detaileddescription.para: Evaluate all the b-spline elements near the singular point which cannot be expressed as a tensor product of 1D B-splines, as well as the non-zero b-spline elements which can be expressed as a tensor product of 1D B-splines.

parameterdescription.para: The value of the b-spline elements near the singular point which cannot be expressed as a tensor product of 1D B-splines, evaluated at the coordinate p.
The value of the non-zero b-spline elements which can be expressed as a tensor product of 1D B-splines.
The coordinate where the basis functions are evaluated.

simplesect.para: The 2D tensor product index of the first b-spline element in the values array.

memberdef.definition: KOKKOS_FUNCTION Idx< BSplinesR, BSplinesTheta > PolarBSplines< BSplinesR, BSplinesTheta, C >::Impl< DDim, MemorySpace >::eval_deriv_r
memberdef.argsstring: (DSpan1D singular_derivs, DSpan2D derivs, ddc::Coordinate< DimR, DimTheta > p) const
memberdef.name: eval_deriv_r

briefdescription.para: Evaluate the radial derivative of the polar basis splines at the coordinate p.

detaileddescription.para: Evaluate the radial derivative of all the b-spline elements near the singular point which cannot be expressed as a tensor product of 1D B-splines, as well as the non-zero b-spline elements which can be expressed as a tensor product of 1D B-splines.

parameterdescription.para: The value of the radial derivative b-spline elements near the singular point which cannot be expressed as a tensor product of 1D B-splines, evaluated at the coordinate p.
The value of the radial derivative of the non-zero b-spline elements which can be expressed as a tensor product of 1D B-splines.
The coordinate where the basis functions are evaluated.

simplesect.para: The 2D tensor product index of the first b-spline element in the values array.

memberdef.definition: KOKKOS_FUNCTION Idx< BSplinesR, BSplinesTheta > PolarBSplines< BSplinesR, BSplinesTheta, C >::Impl< DDim, MemorySpace >::eval_deriv_theta
memberdef.argsstring: (DSpan1D singular_derivs, DSpan2D derivs, ddc::Coordinate< DimR, DimTheta > p) const
memberdef.name: eval_deriv_theta

briefdescription.para: Evaluate the poloidal derivative of the polar basis splines at the coordinate p.

detaileddescription.para: Evaluate the poloidal derivative of all the b-spline elements near the singular point which cannot be expressed as a tensor product of 1D B-splines, as well as the non-zero b-spline elements which can be expressed as a tensor product of 1D B-splines.

parameterdescription.para: The value of the poloidal derivative b-spline elements near the singular point which cannot be expressed as a tensor product of 1D B-splines, evaluated at the coordinate p.
The value of the poloidal derivative of the non-zero b-spline elements which can be expressed as a tensor product of 1D B-splines.
The coordinate where the basis functions are evaluated.

simplesect.para: The 2D tensor product index of the first b-spline element in the values array.

memberdef.definition: KOKKOS_FUNCTION Idx< BSplinesR, BSplinesTheta > PolarBSplines< BSplinesR, BSplinesTheta, C >::Impl< DDim, MemorySpace >::eval_deriv_r_and_theta
memberdef.argsstring: (DSpan1D singular_derivs, DSpan2D derivs, ddc::Coordinate< DimR, DimTheta > p) const
memberdef.name: eval_deriv_r_and_theta

briefdescription.para: Evaluate the second order derivative of the polar basis splines in the radial and poloidal directions, at the coordinate p.

detaileddescription.para: Evaluate the 2nd order derivative of all the b-spline elements near the singular point which cannot be expressed as a tensor product of 1D B-splines, as well as the non-zero b-spline elements which can be expressed as a tensor product of 1D B-splines.

parameterdescription.para: The value of the 2nd order derivative b-spline elements near the singular point which cannot be expressed as a tensor product of 1D B-splines, evaluated at the coordinate p.
The value of the 2nd order derivative of the non-zero b-spline elements which can be expressed as a tensor product of 1D B-splines.
The coordinate where the basis functions are evaluated.

simplesect.para: The 2D tensor product index of the first b-spline element in the values array.

memberdef.definition: KOKKOS_FUNCTION Idx< BSplinesR, BSplinesTheta > PolarBSplines< BSplinesR, BSplinesTheta, C >::Impl< DDim, MemorySpace >::eval
memberdef.argsstring: (DSpan1D singular_values, DSpan2D values, ddc::Coordinate< DimR, DimTheta > coord_eval, EvalTypeR const, EvalTypeTheta const) const
memberdef.name: eval

detaileddescription.para: The Impl class holds the implementation of the PolarBSplines. The implementation is specific to the memory space so that the Fields can be defined with index ranges related to instances of this class.

parameterdescription.para: Indicates where the object is saved. This is either on the host or the device.
